name: succulent pot with succulents
description:
The succulent pot is handbuilt from thin slabs of porcelain clay.

Patterns are embossed into the porcelain using hand-carved Indian wood blocks. 

High-fired to 1260 degrees Centigrade.

Unglazed.

Handmade in Sydney.

Please note: The succulent pots are only available for sale at the Dreamers Market in Australia.The markets  open 3 times a year.  For more information as to when the markets will be open, please go to - 
www.thedreamersmarket.com

name: cloud mobile/chimes
description:
The cloud mobile/ chime is  
handbuilt from thin slabs of porcelain clay.

High fired to 1260 C
Patterns embossed into the porcelain using hand-carved Indian wood blocks.
 
Each ornament is approximately 3 inches/7 cms. x 3 inches/ 7 cms.

The chimes make a lovely sound.
For indoor use only. 

Ready to hang. It will make a great gift and a lovely home decor.

Handmade in Sydney.

name: ornaments- Australia
description:
These beautiful ornaments are 
handbuilt from thin slabs of porcelain clay.

High fired to 1260 C
Patterns embossed into the porcelain using hand-carved Indian wood blocks.
Natural twine.
Handmade tassel.
Each ornament is approximately 3 inches/7 cms. x 3 inches/ 7 cms.

Ready to hang. It will make a great gift and a lovely home decor.

Handmade in Sydney.

name: porcelain tealight holder - square
description:
Handbuilt from thin slabs of porcelain clay
Translucent and vitreous
High fired to 1260 C
Unglazed
approximate dimensions- 4.5 cm. h x 6.5  cm. d

The holes are carved by hand while the clay was still soft.

You can also use it as a jewelry catcher or as a pot for airplants.

Because every pot is handmade, the shapes are not perfect, which adds to the uniqueness and charm of the piece. 

Care: clean in warm soapy water. 

Your pot comes in a natural brown kraft box ready for gift giving and one tealight is also included.

Handmade in Sydney.
